original_text: And Bela the son of Beor reigned in Edom: and the name of his city was Dinhabah.
korean_text: 브올의 아들 벨라가 에돔의 왕이 되었으니 그 도성의 이름은 딘하바며

sentences.original_text: And Bela the son of Beor reigned in Edom
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 베올의 아들 벨라가 에돔에서 다스렸고

sentences.original_text: and the name of his city was Dinhabah
